name: The Swamp Fiend
description:
Game created by a team of 2 in 3 days for the B3agz Jam

A little girl has been kidnapped by a witch, and in order to get out she'll have to solve several puzzles and survive the dangerous swamp. On her own.

Unfortunately though, due to an unexpected bug in the game at the time of uploading, over half of the map was made unaccessible and the game ends early. The game will be updated and fully playable once the jam is over.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • "E" to interact / pick up
  • "R" to retry
